name: The Housemate
description:
"Wait. When did you get out of the house?"

Alan gets back home. Louie, his housemate, is there. For better or for worse. 

The Housemate is a linear, horror visual novel made in 22 days for 2021's Spooktober GameJam.

 Viewer discretion advised. Please play with care.

  • Body Horror
  • Death
  • Implied drug abuse 
  • Implied ableism
  • Verbal abuse 
MORE WARNINGS (SPOILERS):
  • Body horror - disfiguration 
  • Gaslighting
  • Hallucinations
  • Implications of suicide 
  • Traumatic events, such as death of a loved one
  • Note on previous "Implied ableism" warning: while it is not disclosed in the story which mental disorder the main character has (if any), there is several scenes where this is challenged in an aggressive manner.  There are no slurs in this game.
